full_sentence: I'm not black but the way black people so freely use terms like 'Nigga' is disgusting.

Can't see it really holding out for an eternity. Women are primitive kreatures, and so obviously the lesser gender of the species. Men have the inventiveness and innovation in addition to greater physical strength and imagination. This time is yet another era of the human social experiment. These things come and go, though cycles can be multiple hundreds of years in length.
